attributes.action: Ban Legal Highs/Bath Salts in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Despite the decision in April 2010 to ban the so-called legal high Mephedrone worse more addictive and deadly Highs have hit shops across the UK as well as online sites. "Bath Salts" are the main danger and has gone highly unreported in the media. Ive seen first hand what these new Highs can do and many states in America has suffered greatly with these bath salts. They even think certain ones are as addictive as heroin. Take action now and stop these so-called legitimate dealers profitting from peoples misery.
